dialog: Greetings, Miss Wang. How do you fare this fine day? Please, do have a seat.
Many thanks.
In which subject did you specialize during your education, if I may inquire?
I studied Public Relations at the wizarding school of my choice.
Have you put your education to use in the work world?
Indeed I have, sir. After graduation, I spent a year working in the export section of a trade company located in the wizarding city of Macao.
What sorts of duties were you responsible for in that position?
My responsibilities included overseeing the successful export of various wizarding goods and products.
Fascinating, you must have a good understanding of the complexities of export procedures.
Indeed, I do, sir.
Splendid. That will certainly come in useful.
Where to, madam?
To the Grand Hotel, if you please.
The Grand Hotel, you say?
Correct, do you know its location?
I'm afraid not, madam. I do not believe I am familiar with its location.
It can be found on 11th Avenue, at the end of Park Street.
Ah, yes! I know the location well now.
Might I take your order now, madam?
Indeed, I'll start with a serving of the shrimp cocktail, if you please.
